0x69F7C29E.name: IS_RAW_KEY_PRESSED

params.name: rawKeyIndex
params.description: Index of raw key from keyboard.

0x69F7C29E.description:
Gets if the specified `rawKeyIndex` is pressed on the keyboard.

This will not be triggered if the key is disabled with [DISABLE_RAW_KEY_THIS_FRAME](#\_0x8BCF0014)

Virtual key codes can be found [here](https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/inputdev/virtual-key-codes)

examples.code:
if IsRawKeyPressed(32) then -- KEY_SPACE
    print("Spacebar pressed")
end

0x69F7C29E.resultsDescription: Returns bool value of pressed state.
